title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 630 - Special Requirements For Local Governmental Applicants
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 630 - Special Requirements For Local Governmental Applicants

State Regulations
ยง 630.1 - Application for approval for the establishment of hospitals, public home infirmaries or other facilities for inpatient care of the sick by a county, city, town, village or other governmental subdivision

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 630

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, ยง2801-a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
